intro: Psychotria mwinilungae, commonly known as the Mwinilungae Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical rainforests of Central and South America, particularly in regions of Ecuador and Colombia. The plant is characterized by its dark green, glossy leaves and small, clustered white or pale yellow flowers. It produces small, red berries that are edible but have a bitter taste. Due to its restricted habitat and limited distribution, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
